title: "Quite a Stir": Strange Fish With Alien Features Found On US Beach
content: A 6.9-foot-long ocean sunfish (Mola mola) was recently discovered on an Oregon beach, sparking interest from locals and experts.
summary: A 6.9-foot-long ocean sunfish (Mola mola) was recently discovered on an Oregon beach, sparking interest from locals and experts.

title: Saudi Man Jailed For 30 years For Criticising Government On Social Media
content: A Saudi court sentenced a retired teacher to 30 years' jail for criticising the government on social media, less than two months after his death sentence was overturned, his brother said on Tuesday.
summary: A Saudi court sentenced a retired teacher to 30 years' jail for criticising the government on social media, less than two months after his death sentence was overturned, his brother said on Tuesday.

title: How Hezbollah Is Attacking Israel Despite Death Of Its Top Commanders
content: Israel's assault on Iran-backed Hezbollah over the past week, including the targeting of senior commanders and the detonation of booby-trapped pagers and walkie-talkies, has left it reeling.
summary: Israel's assault on Iran-backed Hezbollah over the past week, including the targeting of senior commanders and the detonation of booby-trapped pagers and walkie-talkies, has left it reeling.

title: Canadian PM Justin Trudeau Faces No-Confidence Vote In Parliament
content: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's main rival in Canada's parliament on Tuesday introduced a motion of no confidence in the ruling Liberals, in the first major test of his unpopular minority government.
summary: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's main rival in Canada's parliament on Tuesday introduced a motion of no confidence in the ruling Liberals, in the first major test of his unpopular minority government.

title: Video: Israeli Missile Hits Lebanon Journalist's Home During Live Interview
content: A Lebanese journalist sustained injuries when an Israeli missile struck his home while he was conducting a live TV interview. Fadi Boudaya, the editor-in-chief of Miraya International Network, was seen losing his balance and thrown off-screen.
summary: A Lebanese journalist sustained injuries when an Israeli missile struck his home while he was conducting a live TV interview. Fadi Boudaya, the editor-in-chief of Miraya International Network, was seen losing his balance and thrown off-screen.

title: "Serious Concern": Japan, New Zealand As China Conducts Rare Missile Test
content: China test-launched an intercontinental ballistic missile on Wednesday, firing it into the Pacific Ocean in its first such exercise in decades.
summary: China test-launched an intercontinental ballistic missile on Wednesday, firing it into the Pacific Ocean in its first such exercise in decades.

title: "Don't Want To Be Sandwiched...": New Lanka President's India-China Plans
content: Anura Kumara Dissanayake - Sri Lanka's new Marxist President - has said he wants to avoid being "sandwiched" between India and China but recognises each as a "valued partner", as he tries to resolve a financial crisis roiling his country.
summary: Anura Kumara Dissanayake - Sri Lanka's new Marxist President - has said he wants to avoid being "sandwiched" between India and China but recognises each as a "valued partner", as he tries to resolve a financial crisis roiling his country.

title: 117 Freed, 70 Dead, But Fate Of 64 Hostages Still Held In Gaza Unknown
content: For Hamas, the hostages are key bargaining chips to negotiate a truce with Israel and seek the release of Palestinian prisoners held in Israeli jails.
summary: For Hamas, the hostages are key bargaining chips to negotiate a truce with Israel and seek the release of Palestinian prisoners held in Israeli jails.

title: 'I Call For Return Of Sausages From Gaza': UK PM's Faux Pas Goes Viral
content: UK PM Keir Starmer's slip of the tongue came while he was speaking at the Labour Party conference in Liverpool, as he meant to say "hostages".
summary: UK PM Keir Starmer's slip of the tongue came while he was speaking at the Labour Party conference in Liverpool, as he meant to say "hostages".

title: "Moves Were Already Made": Trump Claims "Big Threats" On His Life By Iran
content: Trump's campaign team said in a statement Tuesday that US intelligence had warned the former president of "real and specific" threats from Iran to assassinate him.
summary: Trump's campaign team said in a statement Tuesday that US intelligence had warned the former president of "real and specific" threats from Iran to assassinate him.

title: Gunshots Fired At Kamala Harris' Campaign Office, 2nd Time In Two Weeks
content: At the time of the incident, the Democratic campaign office in Tempe, located just east of Phoenix in Arizona, was unoccupied and nobody was injured in the attack.
summary: At the time of the incident, the Democratic campaign office in Tempe, located just east of Phoenix in Arizona, was unoccupied and nobody was injured in the attack.

title: "Best Ride": Influencer Praises Self- Driving Tesla Cab, Elon Musk Reacts
content: The video, which has taken social media by storm with over 86,000 views, caught the eye of Tesla CEO Elon Musk.

title: Hezbollah Fires Ballistic Missile Targeting Mossad Base Near Tel Aviv
content: It is the first time the group has claimed a ballistic missile strike since its nearly year-long battle with Israel began after Hamas carried out its October 7 attack.
summary: It is the first time the group has claimed a ballistic missile strike since its nearly year-long battle with Israel began after Hamas carried out its October 7 attack.

title: Indian-Origin Founder Unveils Wearable Device That Records Your Entire Life
content: Mr Paliwal explained that Iris not only organises the photos into a timeline but also uses AI to generate captions and help users recall forgotten details.
summary: Mr Paliwal explained that Iris not only organises the photos into a timeline but also uses AI to generate captions and help users recall forgotten details.

title: Is Musk "Dating" Meloni? What He Said On Viral Pic With Italy PM
content: Billionaire Elon Musk and Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni recently met at an event in New York.

title: Trump Assassination Suspect's Son Arrested In Child Sex Abuse Case
content: The son of Ryan Routh, who is accused of plotting to assassinate Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump at his golf course, has been arrested on charges of possessing child pornography.
summary: The son of Ryan Routh, who is accused of plotting to assassinate Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump at his golf course, has been arrested on charges of possessing child pornography.

title: Indian-Origin New York Health Adviser Fired Over Drug-Fuelled Sex Party
content: DrJay Varma, the former COVID-19 czar of New York City, has been fired from his position at SIGA Technologies following the revelation of his involvement in drug-fuelled sex parties during the pandemic.
summary: DrJay Varma, the former COVID-19 czar of New York City, has been fired from his position at SIGA Technologies following the revelation of his involvement in drug-fuelled sex parties during the pandemic.

title: "Until We Can Restore Peace On Border...": S Jaishankar On India-China Ties
content: The 2020 clash between Indian and Chinese troops in Galwan Valley overshadowed the relations between the two countries and New Delhi's focus for the last four years has been disengagement on the border, External Affairs Minister Dr S Jaishankar said
summary: The 2020 clash between Indian and Chinese troops in Galwan Valley overshadowed the relations between the two countries and New Delhi's focus for the last four years has been disengagement on the border, External Affairs Minister Dr S Jaishankar said

title: Mozilla Faces Privacy Complaint Over Firefox User Tracking
content: The digital rights group NOYB (None Of Your Business) said Mozilla has enabled a feature that turned the browser into a tracking tool for websites without directly telling its users.
summary: The digital rights group NOYB (None Of Your Business) said Mozilla has enabled a feature that turned the browser into a tracking tool for websites without directly telling its users.

title: "If You Want to Die...": Chilling Message US Woman Got In 'Suicide Pod'
content: In a first, an American woman reportedly died by suicide inside a new 3D-printed "suicide pod", Sarco, in a forest cabin in Merishausen, Switzerland.
summary: In a first, an American woman reportedly died by suicide inside a new 3D-printed "suicide pod", Sarco, in a forest cabin in Merishausen, Switzerland.
